alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 10:58AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Columbia County, northwestern Webster, Caddo and northwestern Bossier Parishes, southeastern Marion, southeastern Harrison, Panola and central Rusk Counties through NOON CST... At 1057 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Ida to near Pinehill. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Marshall, Carthage, Springhill, Vivian, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Benton, Cullen, Plain Dealing, Oil City, Beckville, Mooringsport, Hosston, Belcher, Gilliam, Deberry, Elysian Fields and Pinehill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
